userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name to be used by the management service to validate the user.

cloudPassword.description: The password to be used by the management service to validate the user.

managementUri.description: The address for the management service.

tenant.description: The identifier for the Azure Active Directory tenant to be used for authentication.

username.description: The username used to verify the local account.

localPassword.description: The password used to verify the local account.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass "& ./StartRegistration.ps1 -UserPrincipalName ', parameters('userPrincipalName'), ' -CloudPwd ', parameters('cloudPassword'), ' -ManagementUri ', parameters('managementUri'), ' -Tenant ', parameters('tenant'), ' -Username ', parameters('username'), ' -LocalPwd ''', parameters('localPassword'), '''"')]
